DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study is to evaluate whether outpatient cesarean section can be performed in multiparous women without significant decrease in the parents' sense of security .
DOC.brief_title: Outpatient Care for Multiparas After Elective Cesarean Section: an Observational Study
DOC.criteria: Planned elective cesarean section of multiparous women Singleton pregnancy Age of at least 18 Gestational age between 37 and 42 weeks Internet access at home Lack of consent Women with no or little understanding of Danish and ability to speak Danish. Allergies to medicine included in the pain management regimes Expected maternal or neonatal complications after delivery Birth weight of less than 2500 grams
